game.name: Total War: SHOGUN 2 - The Hattori Clan Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Hattori Clan Pack includes all four unlocks previously only available in the Total War: SHOGUN 2 Limited Edition. Key Features:The Hattori clan are masters of the Iga-ryu ninjutsu - a unique collection of martial skills and guerrilla techniques.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Hattori Clan Pack includes all four unlocks previously only available in the Total War: SHOGUN 2 Limited Edition. Key Features:The Hattori clan are masters of the Iga-ryu ninjutsu - a unique collection of martial skills and guerrilla techniques.
game.developers: The Creative Assembly, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
